member.name: T:PerAspera.GameAPI.Events.Core.NativeEventConverter
member.summary: Automatically converts native event data properties to SDK wrappers Processes event objects and replaces native IL2CPP instances with type-safe wrappers

member.name: M:PerAspera.GameAPI.Events.Core.NativeEventConverter.ConvertEventProperties(System.Object)
member.summary: Convert all compatible properties in an event from native instances to SDK wrappers Modifies the event object in-place
member.returns: True if any conversions were performed

member.summary: Convert a specific property value from native to wrapper if possible

member.summary: Determine if a property should be skipped during conversion
member.returns: True if property should be skipped

member.summary: Check if a type is likely a wrapper type (in SDK namespace)
member.returns: True if type appears to be a wrapper

member.summary: Batch convert multiple event objects
member.returns: Number of events that had conversions applied

member.name: M:PerAspera.GameAPI.Events.Core.NativeEventConverter.ConvertEventCopy``1(``0)
member.summary: Create a copy of an event object with all properties converted to wrappers Useful when original event should remain unchanged
member.returns: New event instance with converted properties

member.summary: Attribute to mark properties that should not be converted to wrappers
